DrillableMeteorite.name: Meteorite
DrillableMeteorite.desc: A large chunk of rock and metal originating from space. Rich in minerals.

DrillableLavaDome.name: Lava Dome
DrillableLavaDome.desc: A large upwelling of semisolid magma from deep underground. Contains crystalline materials.

FallingMaterialSpawner.name: Falling Material Predicted Approximate Impact Location

ScannerRoomMeteorPlanner.name: Falling Material Detection Module
ScannerRoomMeteorPlanner.desc: Reprograms a scanner room's detection systems to track orbital debris and predict the time and approximate location of materials falling from space.
